summary: Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman.
cast: Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Per Scheel Krüger|Troels Lyby|Øyvind B. Fabricius Holm|Søren Pilmark|Divya Das|Anne Bærskog Hauger|Fares Fares|Sonja Richter|Rasmus Botoft|Patricia Schumann|Marie Mondrup|Mikkel Boe Følsgaard|Kenneth Carmohn|Michael Brostrup|Jeff Pitzner|Lane Lind|Marijana Jankovic|Anton Honik|Camilla Slyngborg|Marie Boda|Olivia Holden|Katrine Engberg|Betina Grove Ankerdal|Bettina Strange Sandstrøm|Anton Jarlros Gry|Claes Ljungmark|Eric Ericson|Morten Kirkskov|Jesper Riefensthal|Henrik Larsen|Tilde Maja Frederiksen|Lucas Lynggaard Tønnesen|Anna Sofie Helligsøe Haahr|Claus Maack Bahnsen|Ernst Boye|Morten Thunbo|Pernille Lyneborg|Nynne Bojsen|Dorte Højsted|Victor Marcussen|Sebastian Teschemacher|Bebiane Ivalo Kreutzmann|Anders Dines Vinten|Tobias Stæhr Hansen|Peter Plaugborg|Magnus Millang|Marie-Louise Coninck|Stine Prætorius|Divya Das|Christoffer Aro|Martin Boserup|Rasmus Elton|Arild Rimestad
keywords: missing person|copenhagen denmark|hyperbaric chamber|walking in on sex|woman on top
title: Misericordia: Los casos del Departamento Q
